title: Ellar Coltrane, Taking Notes On Life And Girls For 'Boyhood'
teaser: NPR's Tamara Keith spoke with the star of the film, Ellar Coltrane, who spent more than a decade shooting the movie. This story first aired on July 12 on Weekend Edition Saturday.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
